classData.comment:
/**
     * Search vdom child nodes by id or opts object for a given vdom tree
     * @param {Object} vdom
     * @param {Object|String} opts Either an object containing vdom node attributes or a string based id
     * @param {Number} [index] Internal flag, do not use it
     * @param {Object} [parentNode] Internal flag, do not use it
     * @returns {Object}
     *     {Number} index
     *     {String} parentId
     *     {Object} vdom
     */

params.description: Either an object containing vdom node attributes or a string based id
params.name: opts

/**

     * @param {Object|String} targetNodeId Either a vdom node or a vdom node id

     */

/**
     * Search vdom child nodes by id or opts object for a given vdom tree
     * @param {Object} [vdom]

     */

classData.comment:
/**
     * Neo.vdom.Helper will create ids for each vnode which does not already have one,
     * so we need to sync them into the vdom.
     * @param {Neo.vdom.VNode} vnode
     * @param {Object} vdom
     * @param {Boolean} force=false The force param will enforce overwriting different ids
     */
classData.description: Neo.vdom.Helper will create ids for each vnode which does not already have one, so we need to sync them into the vdom.

params.description: The force param will enforce overwriting different ids
params.name: force

classData.name: syncVdomIds
